# `/say` Command
Sends a message in the chat to other players.

<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Permission Level</th>
    <td>Game Directors</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Requires Cheats?</th>
    <td>No</td>
  </tr>
</table>

## Usage
### Say
`/say <message: message>`

Send a `message`.

## Arguments
- `message`: message
Plain text that can include spaces and selectors.
